title: Computer Networks
introduction: Computer networks enable communication between devices. Understanding networking is essential for web development and system design.

topics.name: TCP/IP Protocol
topics.description: Transmission Control Protocol and Internet Protocol

concepts.name: TCP vs UDP
concepts.example:
TCP:
- Reliable, ordered delivery
- Connection-oriented
- Used for: HTTP, FTP, Email

UDP:
- Fast, no guarantees
- Connectionless
- Used for: Video streaming, DNS, Gaming

concepts.name: HTTP Methods
concepts.example:
GET - Retrieve data
POST - Create new resource
PUT - Update entire resource
PATCH - Partial update
DELETE - Remove resource

examples.title: Socket Programming
examples.code:
import socket

# Server
server = socket.socket(socket.AF_INET, socket.SOCK_STREAM)
server.bind(('localhost', 8080))
server.listen(1)
conn, addr = server.accept()
data = conn.recv(1024)
conn.send(b'Hello Client')
conn.close()
